body.name: YOUIN 2 Packs of Iron Fish with Bag-A Natural Source of Iron to Reduce The Risk of Iron Deficiency,an Effective and Safe Cooking Tool to Add Iron to Food,Ideal for Pregnant Women Vegans Athletes
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 mins
features: WHAT'S THE IRON FISH? - The Iron Fish is a simple and effective reusable cooking tool that naturally infuses your meals with a gentle dose of iron by transforming water. Shaped like an adorable fish, this iron supplement tool is designed to release iron at the right concentration, providing essential nutrients. It's particularly helpful for individuals with iron deficiency anemia, including pregnant women, menstruating women, vegans, vegetarians, athletes, blood donors, and those with digestive

HOW TO USE THE IRON FISH - Boil 1L of liquid, add the iron fish with a few drops of acidity, wait for 10 minutes, remove the fish, continue cooking with your ingredients, clean, dry, and store in our burlap bag in the refrigerator.

HOW MANY IRON WILL THE IRON FISH RELEASE? - When used as directed, the Iron Fish releases 6-8mg of absorbable iron, roughly 40% of the daily iron requirement for an average person. A diet that includes regular fish consumption can further contribute to meeting one's iron needs.

IS THE IRON FISH SAFE? - The Iron Fish is crafted from natural, bioavailable iron, releasing low iron levels and is generally safe for most individuals. However, we do not recommend its use if you have a hemoglobin variant like Hemochromatosis. The appearance of rust is a normal occurrence, harmless, and easily cleaned. It also confirms that our Iron Fish is made of natural iron.
HOW TO CARE THIS IRON FISH? - To prevent rust, clean and dry your Iron Fish immediately after removing it from the pot. If rust appears, simply scrub it with lemon juice or vinegar to remove it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don’t feel as tired after using these in my tea every day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The irony of getting much needed iron from iron itself! I felt the difference on the first day I drank the iron infused water. I had more energy, and didn't get the 2PM "sleepies." The process is easy. The flavor isn't great but the splash of citrus (read instructions) helps lessen the metallic taste. Be sure to wash the fish well, dry it, put it in a ziplock bag and store it in the fridge to prevent rust. Thanks to the iron fish, I won't have to purchase iron supplements for quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this due to the iron being low in my family. I think it is working so far. Such a simple idea using iron in our food. It worked for my great-grandma to 101. Hope something like this will help us. Be safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cumple lo que dice
reviews.reviewText: Para una persona como yo que siempre pasa deficiente de hierro, me ha funcionado de maravilla. Sigo las instrucciones que me indica en el empaque y de verdad que siento la diferencia en cuanto a energía. Le doy sus merecidas 5 estrellas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: Really makes a difference infusing iron into hot tea and food

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the fish for over a month and I am very satisfied with results. I can feel it's helping me with dizziness and fatigue. I use it to boil my regular drinking water and I'm very consistent drinking about 1-2 lts daily. I think that is why is helping me. For use and storage I followed previews reviews and recommendations and is working perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product... wonderful gift for anyone with low iron count.
reviews.reviewText: Love them... easy to use. I’m low on iron so any extra is great! Just simply boil them in water and use as your drinking water to add iron to your diet. Can also use in soup base when cooking to add iron to food if you choose.
